title: Wikipedia - Situationist International (SI)
description:
"The Situationist International (SI) was an international organization of social revolutionaries, the exclusive membership of which was made up of avant-garde artists, intellectuals, and political theorists, active from its formation in 1957 to its dissolution in 1972."

Wikipedia Situationist International ebook. Selected articles from Wikipedia related to Situationist Internationsl in .epub format. 

This book is part of the radical seed collection; and for independent researchers
looking to followup the citations and further readings, you can find most of them in the radical seed (https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9389639/Op_Radical_Seed).
